import {Fragment, useContext} from "react" import {Link, Outlet} from "react-router-dom" import { UserContext } from "../contexts/userContext" import { signOutUser } from "../utils/firebase" const Navigation = () => { const {currentUser} = useContext(UserContext) console.log(currentUser) return (
Home
Signup
About
{ currentUser ? (Sign Out) : ( Sign In ) }
) } export default Navigation
